# Cloak of Elvenkind
## Overview
**Aura** faint illusion; **CL** 3rd

**Slot** shoulders

**Price** 2,500 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

When this plain gray cloak is worn with the hood drawn up around the head, the wearer gains a +5 competence bonus on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Invisibility (Spell)|invisibility]]*, creator must be an elf

**Cost** 1,250 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 507
